PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-02182022-03-04,  ,  ,  ,  ECCC, 
ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
SubjectOrder to Extend the Decision Deadline on the Potential Environmental Effects of the Bay du Nord Development Project (40 days)
PrecisOrder to extend the time limit by which the Minister of the Environment must make a decision on the significance of the potential environmental effects of the BAY DU NORD DEVELOPMENT PROJECT, by 40 days.
AttachmentsAttachment
